li.label: Animals Do Not Mine to Escape
li.tooltip: Animals will no longer break through walls when they are hungry.

li.label: Less Preferable Insect Jelly
li.tooltip: Moves insect jelly to the rawTasty preferability alongide berries.

li.label: Permanent Enemies Do Not Flee
li.tooltip: Raiders from permanently hostile factions like pirates won't flee when they're losing the fight.

li.label: Buff Spouse Opinion
li.tooltip: Increases the spouse opinion moodlet to +100 to lower the likelihood of divorce. Ought to be -100 though.

li.label: Remove Mood Debuff for Banishing Colonists
li.tooltip: Removes all moodlets related to banishing colonists/prisoners/animals and rejecting joiners.

li.label: Fewer Fat Bodies
li.tooltip: Replaces fat bodies in backstories with normal bodies, significantly lowering their chances of appearing without removing the body outright. Doesn't affect xenotypes with the fat gene.

li.label: Fewer Hulk Bodies
li.tooltip: Replaces hulk bodies in backstories with normal bodies, significantly lowering their chances of appearing without removing the body outright. Doesn't affect xenotypes with the hulk gene.

li.label: Fewer Thin Bodies
li.tooltip: Replaces thin bodies in backstories with normal bodies, significantly lowering their chances of appearing without removing the body outright. Doesn't affect xenotypes with the thin gene.

li.label: Remove Beards
li.tooltip: Removes all beards from the game. Probably not a good idea to enable mid-save.

li.label: Remove Narrow Heads
li.tooltip: Aggressively removes narrow heads from the game. Patching logic works for every mod I've tested. Probably not a good idea to enable mid-save. Has no effect on Facial Animation.

li.label: Remove Wide Female Heads
li.tooltip: Removes the wide female head from the game. Probably not a good idea to enable mid-save. Has no effect on Facial Animation.

li.label: Show Melanin Palette
li.tooltip: Change the melanin endogenes colors to a custom value.
Selected Color
Selected Color
Selected Color
Selected Color
Selected Color
Selected Color
Selected Color
Selected Color
Selected Color

li.label: Increase Hopper Stack Limit
li.tooltip: Increases the hopper stack limit from 1 to 3.

li.label: Most Apparel Covers Hands and Feet
li.tooltip: Adds foot coverage to vanilla apparel that covers the full leg. Adds hand coverage to vanilla apparel to apparel that covers the full arm. In each case, a note is appended to the description of the apparel.

li.label: Move All Storage Buildings to Their Own Tab
li.tooltip: Moves every buildable thingDef with storage settings to a new tab in the architect menu.

li.label: Separate Surgery From Doctor Worktype
li.tooltip: Separate the harvest workgiver from the grower workgiver.

li.label: Remove Consciousness Debuff for Food Poisoning
li.tooltip: Removes the consciousness debuff from food poisoning because consciousness is already affected by the blood filtration debuff and pain.

li.label: Remove Default Settings for Storage Buildings
li.tooltip: Newly built storage buildings will not store any items by default.

li.label: Render Hair Over Apparel
li.tooltip: Tells the game to render hair over apparel like armor and coats.

li.label: Reset All
li.message: Are you sure? This will reset every tab.

li.label: Add Royalty Tab to Architect Menu
li.tooltip: Moves Royalty-related buildables like the royal bed and meditation spots to their own tab.

li.label: Darkness Meme Grants Fungal Gravel
li.tooltip: Allows fungal gravel to be built with the darkness meme.

li.label: Fungal Gravel Can Be Placed Anywhere
li.tooltip: Removes the overhead mountain requirement for fungal gravel.

li.label: Remove Forced Styles for New Ideologies
li.tooltip: Newly generated ideologies will not have styles based on their memes or structures. You can still pick styles manually.

li.label: Remove Preferred Apparel for New Ideologies
li.tooltip: Newly generated ideologies will not have preferred apparel. You can still pick preferred apparel manually.

li.label: Remove Slave Work Disabler
li.tooltip: Allows slaves to do every work type except for wardening.

li.label: Specialists Can Do More Work
li.tooltip: Allows specialists to do everything with the ManualDumb work tag.

li.text: These sliders affect the base values before the accelerated biosculpting precept, attuned, and sterile room multipliers are applied.

li.label: Double Gauranlen Output
li.tooltip: Doubles the yield for gauranlens like the medicine maker to make them less terrible.

li.label: Allow Lifter Mechanoid To Do More Hauling Jobs
li.tooltip: Brings lifter mechanoids more in line with human pawns, allowing them to do more hauling and hauling-related like carrying other mechs to a recharger.

li.label: Disable Exostrider Remains on All Scenarios
li.tooltip: Does exactly what the title says. For some reason it adds the part twice which is harmless but annoying.

li.label: Do Not Replace Core Factions
li.tooltip: Factions like the impid tribe will no longer replace their vanilla counterpart. Both will appear by default and can be disabled manually in world creation.

li.label: Increase Wastepack Stack Size
li.tooltip: Also allows wastepacks to be stored on shelves.

li.label: Mech Chips Are Invincible
li.tooltip: Mechanoid chips dropped by war machines in command of massive mechanoid armies, created by the machine gods of the universe capable of bending time and reality, whose sole purpose in this world is to engage in combat and defeat the its strongest enemies, now won't be destroyed by a stray bolt action rifle round.

li.label: Reduce Opinion Offset For Killing Children
li.tooltip: Reduces the -20 "killed a child" opinion debuff to -6, because sometimes these kids are asking for it.

li.label: Better Mechanitor
li.tooltip: Arms mechanitor starting pawns with a biocoded heavy SMG. Ensures they are capable of crafting, doctoring (for self tending), intellectual (vanilla), and violence. Adds a few negative traits to the disallowed traits list to make single-pawn colonies more viable. Guarantees their crafting and intellectual skills are between 6 and 12.

li.label: No Fixed Gender
li.tooltip: Mechanitors will be male and female.

li.label: Mechanitor Maximum Age: {maxAgeMechanitor} (must be greater than minimum age)
All Lootable Containers Glow
li.tooltip: Add the CompProperties_Glower comp to to every ThingDef with CompProperties_LootSpawn if it doesn't already have it.

li.label: Reduce Fishing Research Cost to 200
li.tooltip: Because researching fishing poles should be easier than researching gravtech.

li.label: Move Fishing to Its Own Work Type
li.tooltip: Moves fishing from the hunting work type to its own work type, between crafting and hauling.

li.label: Gravship Hulls Are Conduits
li.tooltip: Add the CompPowerTransmitter comp to gravship hulls so that they carry power.

li.label: Gravship Hulls Cost 9 Steel
li.tooltip: Increases the steel cost of gravship hulls from 7 to 9 to compensate for added functionality.

li.label: Debloat and Rebalance
li.tooltip: Removes the cum eating fetish. Increases condom stack limit to 500. Humpshroom doesn't increase psyfocus.
